topnavbar_error-bot-down: The Discord bot is currently down. A reason for this may be schedueled maintenance or system failure. Therefore, many parts of our website and also the login are not working. We apologize for any inconvenience and ask for your patience!
cookieconsent_info-text: This website uses cookies to enhance the user experience.
homepage_text-loop-install-plugins: Install plugins on your Discord server!
homepage_slogan: An all-in-all Discord bot that offers many cool new features in plugins which you can install to your Discord server!
homepage_buttonbar-invite: Invite me to your Discord server
homepage_buttonbar-support: Questions? Issues? Get support on our Discord server
